summary: 2048 x 2048 resolution of the Goats. New custom textures used.
descriptionHtml:
Werebat says:
[color=gold][size=5]"You saved the game for me. A must-have mod!"[/size][/color]

skinnydrumma says:
[color=gold][size=5]"Definitely an improvement! endorsed."[/size][/color]

[color=silver][size=4]Another forgotten, awful looking creature on low, medium, high and ultra high settings. This mod fixes that.
Using my own textures I have given the goats a cleaner, less pixelated look.
This mod re-textures goats.[/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21962]Wolverine2710's Automatic Variants Port for my Better Goat[/url]
author: yourenotsupposedtobeinhere
